title: [娱乐][信息]FrozenJoin —— |自定义权限|进退消息|加入欢迎语|[1.7.x-1.16.x]
author: 鹊吟猫
txt_content:
本帖最后由 鹊吟猫 于 2020-7-15 08:49 编辑

插件授权图片:




X)8DZ]_RRZVM[@S8YAV[YD4.png (24.11 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2020-6-24 16:12 上传





作者:Frcsty========================================Frozen Join 是一款可以完全自定义权限来提供加入/退出消息允许对不同组提供不同的随机加入/退出json格式消息(所有格式)Frozen Join还提供了PlaceholderAPI支持就比如Admin权限组上线可以激活某某op上线了某某op进水坑了某某op进服务器了随机选择其中一个输出以此类推还有消失格式(我没理解透请进原帖查看详情233)随机模式在spigot核心的1.15.2有些问题 其他版本没测试========================================指令/join reload 重载插件/join info 查看插件信息/join help 查看插件帮助/join motd 查看MOTD消息/join motd 有独立指令为 /motd========================================权限
无需自己在Config.yml配置文件设置========================================Config.yml文件(附动作个人汉化注释):



config.yml
(4.13 KB, 下载次数: 41)

白嫖还是支持？
点击捐赠作者========================================更新记录(原文)2020.6.10 版本:1.2.1NOTE: The hex colors are only available for servers running 1.16+, as it was only introduced in this version.Action Changes:An old action has been reintroduced- EQUP Action: The equip item action has been readded and changed to properly support both old and new material styles:> 1.13+ = [EQUIP] item;display;lore;amount;slot> 1.13- = [EQUIP] item,data;display;lore;amount;slot(Lore seperator is currently ~ and may be changed in the future if it...2020.6.10 版本:1.2.0NOTE: Due to the changes to a new Actions library, all previous actions have been changed/adjusted, some removed, some added.If there was an action that was removed, which you were using, please contact me on discord and it will be added back!Action Changes: New actions have been introduced, as well as the old ones reworked.- Delayed Actions: You are now able to execute delayed actions, these are presented as modifiers to the regular actions. Inputs for this action...2020.4.26 版本:1.1.1Added a new action:- [rangebroadcast](More explained in the config).Removed particles action as it wasn't working all the time.Added more documentation inside the config.yml for the actions.Cleaned some code2020.4.19 版本:1.1.0Added format priorites:They range from lowest to highest, heighest being the first to be applied if you have multiple format permissions.Moved to objects instead of accessing config every join.Preparations for adding multiple motds as well.The action system has been switched out, but will work as before. If you encounter an issue with an action, please contact me on discord (Frosty#3308) and report it!2020.4.15 版本:1.0.2Added format types:Format types are the ability to specify the current format, either being a normal format, or being random format.- NORMAL: the standard format which executes all listed actions- RANDOM: a random action selected from the listed actions(example for both format types can be seen in the default config)更新记录(中文)2020.6.10 版本:1.2.1十六进制颜色仅适用于运行1.16+的服务器，因为此版本仅引入了十六进制颜色。动作变更：重新引入了旧动作-EQUP动作：装备项目动作已被读取并更改为正确支持新旧材料样式：> 1.13+ = [EQUIP]item;display;lore;amount;slot> 1.13- = [EQUIP]item,data;display;lore;amount;slot（Lor分隔符目前为〜，如果将来可能会更改...2020.6.10 版本:1.2.0注意: 因为对新的动作库进行了改动,所以旧的动作库都已更改一些已经被删除/添加如果有些旧的动作被删除但你希望或者喜欢用的话请联系作者(可能会被添加)动作问题: 加入了新的动作并对旧版动作进行了调整.延迟动作: 现在已经可以延迟动作了，该动作将会变成常规动作2020.4.26 版本:1.1.1添加了一个新操作：[rangebroadcast]（更多在配置中说明）删除了粒子作用，因为粒子一直无效在config.yml中为操作添加了更多可编辑项清理了一些代码2020.4.19 版本:1.1.0新增的格式优先级：优先级值越低贼越优先移动到对象，而不是每次连接都访问配置为添加多个MOTD做准备动作系统已关闭，如果您在操作上遇到问题，请联系作者！2020.4.15 版本:1.0.2新增的格式类型：格式类型可以指定当前格式，可以是NORMAL格式，也可以是RANDOM格式。NORMAL：按照顺序输出动作RANDOM：在你填写的动作中随机输出动作（两种格式类型的示例都可以在默认配置中看到）========================================我搬运的作品UltraParkour
FlamyArrows
NexelWilderness
排版那是一模一样的233
